snippet.title: Does NBC Investing In English Soccer Vindicate Joel Ewanick?
snippet.description: NBC Sports launched their new $250 million English Premier League venture recently. And very impressive it is too, I thought. Every English Barclays Premier League game live in 1080i HD. Split between NBC and NBCSports channels. Some fine commentary, decent punditry and one or two new technical tricks. And the first showing of what [...] read »

snippet.title: Footballer Messi Scores Hat Trick, Clears Tax Debt As Season Rolls
snippet.description: After months of speculation that Lionel Messi and his father, Jorge Horacio, might settle their tax case with Spanish authorities, the football superstar has made a "corrective payment." read »

snippet.title: Murdoch's BSkyB Hits Hat-Trick On Soccer TV Rights
snippet.description: U.K.'s number one pay-TV provider predictably dominates first round of bidding. read »

snippet.title: It's Time To Raise Our Expectations Of Jurgen Klinsmann And The U.S. Men's Soccer Team
snippet.description: (Image credit: Getty Images via @daylife) Jurgen Klinsmann and the U.S. Men’s National Soccer, with their 1-0 win last week over Costa Rica in a driving Colorado blizzard, saved themselves a lot of grief. The win followed the most trying week in the Klinsmann’s nearly two-year reign as the U.S. manager. [...] read »

snippet.title: Why Is Soccer Part Of The London 2012 Olympics?
snippet.description: (Photo credit: Wikipedia) The last few weeks leading to a major sporting event is one of the worst times for organizers. Competition is not yet underway but the media still need stories and rarely are they positive. It may not be the equivalent of the "Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse" but [...] read »

snippet.title: The Difficulties Of Running A Soccer Team In Ciudad Juárez
snippet.description: (Image by Getty Images South America via @daylife) For the past week I’ve been reading a new book called This Love is Not for Cowards: Salvation and Soccer in Ciudad Juárez. That city, just across the border from El Paso, has one of the highest murder rates in the world. And [...] read »

snippet.title: The Best Soccer Movies
snippet.description: There are shockingly few films made on soccer. But then soccer is not America's (or Hollywood's) favorite sport. We've put together a list of the best films on soccer. read »

snippet.title: Tom Hicks’ Approaches Unenviable Hat Trick
In Pictures: Soccer's Best Big-Buck Values
